sameAnalysis.word_list: laugh, smile, giggle, grin, beam, sneer
means: laugh ： 最常用词，指因喜悦、愉快或轻视而出声的笑或大笑。
smile ： 指面露微笑，侧重于无声。
giggle ： 指发出咯咯的笑声，较多地用于女人或孩子。
beam ： 书面用词，指人因心情舒畅而发出的笑，即喜形于色地笑。

sentence.Network_en: All at once, Mick's serious expression softened into a grin.
sentence.Network_cn: 米克严肃的表情一下子变成了笑脸。

sentence.Network_en: He had a grin on his face like a Cheshire Cat.
Bobby looked at her with a sheepish grin.
sentence.Network_cn: 博比望着她腼腆地咧嘴一笑。

jx.jx_en_mean: suffer pain or misfortune in a stoical manner

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English grennian 'bare the teeth in pain or anger', of Germanic origin; probably related to groan

entry.def: When you grin, you smile broadly.

example.ex: He grins, delighted at the memory...
example.tran: 想到往事，他开心地咧嘴笑了起来。

example.ex: Sarah tried several times to catch Philip's eye, but he just grinned at her.
example.tran: 萨拉几次想引起菲利普的注意，但是他只是冲她咧嘴笑了笑。

entry.def: A grin is a broad smile.

example.ex: She came out of his office with a big grin on her face...
example.tran: 她笑容满面地走出他的办公室。

example.ex: Bobby looked at her with a sheepish grin.
example.tran: 博比望着她腼腆地咧嘴一笑。

entry.def: If you grin and bear it, you accept a difficult or unpleasant situation without complaining because you know there is nothing you can do to make things better.

example.ex: They cannot stand the sight of each other, but they will just have to grin and bear it.
example.tran: 他们连看对方一眼都不愿意，但是也只得默默忍受。

means.word_mean: 1. a facial expression characterized by turning up the corners of the mouth; usually shows pleasure or amusement
1. to draw back the lips and reveal the teeth, in a smile, grimace, or snarl

auth_sentence.content: He patted his weapon and gave a wolfish grin.
auth_sentence.res_content: He patted his weapon and gave a wolfish grin.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He patted his weapon and gave a wolfish grin.

auth_sentence.content: Roll with it, come up with a helpless grin.
auth_sentence.res_content: Roll with it, come up with a helpless grin.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Roll with it, come up with a helpless grin.

auth_sentence.content: Richards says, with his wolfy grin, wholly amused.
auth_sentence.res_content: Richards says, with his wolfy grin, wholly amused.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Richards says, with his wolfy grin, wholly amused.

sentences.en: I know she is joking because she has a big grin on her face.
sentences.cn: 我知道她是在开玩笑, 因为她满脸笑容。

sentences.en: He was grinning proudly, delighted with his achievements.
sentences.cn: 他为自己的成就感到喜悦, 自豪地咧着嘴笑。

jushi.english: I know she is joking because she has a big grin on her face.
jushi.chinese: 我知道她是在开玩笑,因为她满脸笑容。

jushi.english: The wolf grinned in an ugly way.
jushi.chinese: 那只狼可憎地龇着牙咧着嘴。

jushi.english: If you won't let me go,I suppose I will just have to grin and bear it.
jushi.chinese: 你不让我走,那我也只好顺从你。
